channel.title: Computer Locks Itself -_-
channel.description:
New Vista Ultimate installation. Don't know what setting I turned off on the last one but on this one, if I leave it unattended for x minutes, it goes to the Locked mode and lets you pick a username.
Useless function cause I just click on my username and everything's back to normal.
How do I get that off?
Also, will Vuze keep downloading in that state? While it's locked?

item.title: Computer Locks Itself -_-
item.dc:creator: @runescape3dude runescape3dude
item.description:
@runescape3dude wrote:

sleeping/hibernating = no
locked = yes

I like this feature cause [size=70pt]SOME STUPID AUSTRALIAN KEEPS GOING ONTO MY COMPUTER AND LOOK UP BAD STUFF.[/size]

item.title: Computer Locks Itself -_-
item.dc:creator: @SomethingToHide STH
item.description:
@SomethingToHide wrote:

I kinda got it. It was in screensaver stuff. I had to edit advanced settings to not lock it when it’s idle.

Still would like to know if Vuze or any bittorrent client downloads while computer is sleeping, hibernating, locked, or whatever.

Read full topic
